sentences.en: As he is a troublemaker, no one likes to work together with him.
sentences.cn: 这个人爱搅局, 谁都不愿同他共事.

sentences.en: But we also are committed to a peacemaker and a troublemaker.
sentences.cn: 我们也坚持成为和平制造者,而不是麻烦制造者.

sentences.en: By high school Ware was the most celebrated troublemaker in his town.
sentences.cn: 在威尔上高中以前,他是镇上最出名的问题儿童.

sentences.en: He is from a decent family, and is never a troublemaker.
sentences.cn: 他是好人家的孩子, 从不招惹是非.

sentences.en: He was a troublemaker , a constant storm center at school.
sentences.cn: 他是个捣蛋鬼, 常常成为给学校惹事生非的中心人物.

sentences.en: He's a troublemaker, you should keep him at arm's length.
sentences.cn: 他是闹事者, 你应该跟他保持一定距离.

sentences.en: His friends think he's cool, but his teachers think he a troublemaker.
sentences.cn: 他朋友们认为他很酷, 但老师认为他是个捣蛋鬼.

sentences.en: I put the boy down as a troublemaker as soon as I saw him.
sentences.cn: 我一看见这孩子就以为他很调皮.

sentences.en: I would hate you to think me a troublemaker.
sentences.cn: 我不愿你认为我是个搬弄是非的人.

sentences.en: In many classrooms, Perry might simply have been regarded as a troublemaker.
sentences.cn: 在很多课堂上, 佩里可能都被认为是个捣蛋鬼.

sentences.en: Li Yang has always been a troublemaker.
My brother, quite a troublemaker as a juvenile, can tie and untie any knot.
sentences.cn: 我哥哥在少年时经常惹事生非, 但他打结解结是把好手.

sentences.en: The boy was labeled a troublemaker.
sentences.cn: 这男孩被人称作捣蛋鬼.

sentences.en: The fair coordinator has been given powers to expel suspected troublemakers.
sentences.cn: 那位公正的协调员已被赋予权力，以驱逐涉嫌闹事者。

sentences.en: The landlord grabbed the troublemaker and from marched him out the door.
sentences.cn: 房东抓住了捣蛋鬼,把他双臂反拧后强推出门.

sentences.en: They also did not want to be labeled a troublemaker or to lose their jobs.
sentences.cn: 而且她们不想被说成是“事妈”,或者因此而失去工作.

words.tran_cn: 麻烦的；讨厌的；使人苦恼的
故障检修工；解决纠纷者；解决麻烦问题的能手
捣乱者，闹事者；惹麻烦的人

trans.tran_en: If you refer to someone as a troublemaker, you mean that they cause unpleasantness, quarrels, or fights, especially by encouraging people to oppose authority
